PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_Risk
PropertySetDef.Definition: An indication of exposure to mischance, peril, menace, hazard or loss. HISTORY: Extended in IFC2x3 Refactored in IFC4.3 There are various types of risk that may be encountered and there may be several instances of Pset_Risk associated in an instance of an IfcProcess. Specification of this property set incorporates the values of the Incom risk analysis matrix (satisfying AS/NZS 4360) together with additional identified requirements including UK PAS 1192-6.

PropertyDef.Name: RiskName
PropertyDef.Definition: A locally unique identifier for the risk entry that can be used to track the development and mitigation of the risk throughout the project life cycle

PropertyDef.Name: RiskType
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the predefined types of risk from which the type required may be set.

PropertyDef.Name: NatureOfRisk
PropertyDef.Definition:
An indication of the generic nature of the risk that might be encountered.
NOTE: It is anticipated that there will be a local agreement that constrains the values that might be assigned to this property. An example might be 'Fall' or 'Fall of grille unit' causing injury and damage to person and property.

PropertyDef.Name: AssociatedProduct
PropertyDef.Definition: An indication or link to any associated product or material that may trigger the hazard.

PropertyDef.Name: AssociatedActivity
PropertyDef.Definition: An indication or link to any associated activity or process that may trigger the hazard.

PropertyDef.Name: AssociatedLocation
PropertyDef.Definition: An indication or link to any associated location or space that may trigger the hazard.

PropertyDef.Name: RiskAssessmentMethodology
PropertyDef.Definition: An indication or link to the chosen risk assessment methodology, for example UK PAS1192-6 or a chosen ISO13100 annex.

PropertyDef.Name: UnmitigatedRiskLikelihood
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the likelihood of the hazard prior to any specific mitigation.

PropertyDef.Name: UnmitigatedRiskConsequence
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the level of severity of the consequences that the risk would have in case it happens.

PropertyDef.Name: UnmitigatedRiskSignificance
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the significance of the risk given the likelihood and consequence prior to any specific mitigation.

PropertyDef.Name: MitigationPlanned
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies preventive measures to be taken to mitigate risk.

PropertyDef.Name: MitigatedRiskLikelihood
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the likelihood of the hazard given the planned mitigation.

PropertyDef.Name: MitigatedRiskConsequence
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the level of severity of the consequences that the risk would have in case it happens.

PropertyDef.Name: MitigatedRiskSignificance
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies the significance of the risk given the mitigation of likelihood and consequence.

PropertyDef.Name: MitigationProposed
PropertyDef.Definition: Any proposed, but not yet agreed and irrevocable, mitigation of the likelihood and consequences of the hazard.
